-- com.grand.web.community.dao.TBoardDAOImpl.Mapper.selectCommunity
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 rnum, tbl.* FROM ( SELECT tb.board_idx ,tb.board_title ,tb.board_menu_code ,tb.board_cate_L ,tb.board_cate_M ,date_format(tb.board_reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as board_reg_date ,date_format(tb.board_show_str_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as board_show_str_date ,date_format(tb.board_show_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as board_show_end_date ,tb.board_reg_name ,tb.board_detail ,tb.board_memory ,tb.board_mobile ,tb.board_secret ,tb.board_notice ,tb.board_useyn ,tb.birthday ,tb.board_etc1 ,tb.board_etc2 ,tb.board_etc3 ,tb.board_etc4 ,tb.board_reply ,tb.save_file ,tb.board_url
,tcd.tcd_title as tcd_title ,tcds.tcd_title as tcds_title
FROM t_board tb
left OUTER join t_code_detail tcd on tb.board_cate_L = tcd.tcd_code left OUTER join t_code_detail tcds on tb.board_cate_M = tcds.tcd_code
order by board_reg_date asc,board_idx asc
) tbl, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) sub ORDER BY sub.rnum desc
LIMIT #{startpage} , #{rows}

UPDATE t_board SET board_cnt = board_cnt +1 WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx}
